Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 33rd overall pick, by Plum Grove in 1980...
Injured on 6/1/1980 with a Bruised Foot, out for one week...
Had first career hit on 6/5/1984, off Aldo Cahoon (TOL)...

Injured on 8/27/1985 with a Bruised Heel, out for one week...
Traded from Plum Grove to New Jersey on 7/20/1988 (Going to NJ: CF G. Jacobs. Going to PG: RF D. Cifuentes, 1B J. Llorent)...
